title: W. Somerset Maugham
summary: William Somerset Maugham[lower-alpha 1] CH (/mɔːm/ MAWM; 25 January 1874 – 16 December 1965)[2] was an English playwright, novelist, and short-story writer. He was among the most popular writers of his era and reputedly the highest-paid author during the 1930s.[3]
